title: What are the different techniques and exercises involved in hypnotherapy and self-hypnosis?
first_phrase: In the last part of this text, the focus shifts to different techniques and exercises related to hypnotherapy and self-improvement. The text begins with a discussion of archetypes and how they can be psychologically colored through life experiences and education. The text then moves on to discuss hermeticism and quantum physics and the relationship between symbols and the elements. Techniques for stopping smoking and dealing with allergies are also discussed, as well as methods for self-hypnosis and weight loss. The last sections of the text explore different levels of moving therapy and how to adapt to a client's personality through touch and approach. Overall, the text provides a comprehensive overview of various techniques and exercises that can help individuals improve themselves and reach a state of balance and harmony.

last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding the preferences and personality of each client is crucial for successful hypnosis. The mirror exercise and the enneagram can help us put away our identifications and identify our compulsions. Moreover, self-hypnosis and clairvoyance can enhance our sensitivity and increase the results of our hypnosis sessions.
